text: Sumon (Popularly known as Master Sumon) is a Bangladeshi film actor. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist for the film Ashikkhito (1978) which he shared with Azad Rahman Shakil. ==Selected films== * Shikriti (1972) * Ashikkhito (1978) * Chhutir Ghonta (1980) * Puroskar (1983) ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" !
